Previews Sept 06 & 07

The Boxtrolls (PG)

Release date:

12th September 2014

Running time:

97 mins

Synopsis:

An orphan boy leads his quirky family of subterranean critters into battle with an evil villain in this fun-packed family animation.

Cast:

Sir Ben Kingsley, Isaac Hempstead-Wright, Elle Fanning, Tracy Morgan, Richard Ayoade, Nick Frost, Jared Harris, Toni Collette, Simon Pegg

Director:

Graham Annable, Anthony Stacchi
